mapper.select: select a.kd_pemda, b.urpemda, concat(a.kd_rek_1,'.',a.kd_rek_2,'.',a.kd_rek_3) as level3, concat(a.kd_rek_1,'.',a.kd_rek_2,'.',a.kd_rek_3,'.',a.kd_rek_4,'.',a.kd_rek_5) as level5, case WHEN c.nm_akrual_3 ISNULL THEN 'Rek gak tahu' ELSE c.nm_akrual_3 end from elimination_account a LEFT JOIN ref_pemda2 b on concat(kdprovinsi,'.',kdpemda ) = a.kd_pemda LEFT JOIN ref_akrual_3 c on concat(c.kd_akrual_1,'.',c.kd_akrual_2,'.',c.kd_akrual_3) = concat(a.kd_rek_1,'.',a.kd_rek_2,'.',a.kd_rek_3) where a.tahun = '2016' and a.kd_pemda = '01.00' and a.tahun = b.tahun
